about_the_game:
CarX Street - Deluxe Cars opens the doors to a world of exclusive cars and thrilling races. In this release, you'll get six unique cars, each made to stand out on the track and draw attention.

This bundle includes:

  • 30ZC: A convertible that's perfectly suited for those who value freedom and speed. With its elegant design, you're sure to stand out on any track.

  • S90C: A convertible that adds a touch of refinement to your garage. Its power and smooth operation make every race unforgettable.

  • M92C: A convertible that combines style and performance. It's for anyone who wants to be at the forefront of any race.*

  • M39: A legend that's ready to master any track. This car distinguishes itself with its aggressive style and outstanding features.

  • S65: With its powerful engine and maneuverability, this car is ready to become your trusty partner in the most intense races.*

  • Z40: A street racing icon. This car was built to win, and its dynamics and style will impress even the most experienced racers.*

  • GLW - A legendary off-road vehicle built to conquer any peak. Its iconic design is recognizable from afar, and its performance leaves everyone impressed.

  • LMA - A sports car perfectly suited for the diverse tracks of Sunset Speedway. This car blends elegance, style, and exhilarating dynamics.

*The M92C, S65, and Z40 will be automatically unlocked in the car showroom when you reach level 21.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
